body_html: Just had a thought that it might be good to move the C++ StagingArea and MapStagingArea classes into separate header and source files so that they can be reused as primitives in other ops. I'll try do this soon.
body_text: Just had a thought that it might be good to move the C++ StagingArea and MapStagingArea classes into separate header and source files so that they can be reused as primitives in other ops. I'll try do this soon.
body: Just had a thought that it might be good to move the C++ StagingArea and MapStagingArea classes into separate header and source files so that they can be reused as primitives in other ops. I'll try do this soon.
